content: --याजिन् {1} sacrificing for oneself or himself. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} a learned man who studies his own nature and that of the soul (of others) to secure eternal felicity, one who looks upon all beings as self; सर्वभूतेषु चात्मानं सर्वभूतानि चात्मनि . समं पश्यन्नात्मयाजी स्वाराज्यमधिगछति; <ls>Ms. 12. 91.</ls>
